sections.title: Overview: E-commerce sites and SAVA migration
sections.summary: Introduces the e-commerce sites the team is working on and says they are deploying and integrating services to move to the new SAVA experience.

sections.title: Adding products to cart (demonstration)
sections.summary: Demonstrates adding items (example: paint products) to the cart and confirms that two products are present in the cart.
key_actions: Use 'add to cart' action to add product

sections.title: Search results missing 'Add to cart' option (bug/validation)
sections.summary: Search for a product (paint) does not display the 'add to cart' option — identified as something the team needs to validate.
key_actions: Observe missing 'add to cart' option in search results
Flag/validate this behavior with the team
ui_elements: Add to cart button (missing in this context)

sections.title: Cart -> Checkout behavior not implemented / clears cart
sections.summary: When viewing the cart with selected items, proceeding to checkout currently clears the cart — this behavior is not implemented correctly and needs attention.
key_actions: Open cart to review selected items
Observe cart is cleared (unexpected) and mark as not implemented

sections.title: Next steps: team tasks and localization
sections.summary: Notes there are a couple of places (including general local feel) where the team will work in the SAVA application to address these issues.
